Tools

  • delta: A viewer for git and diff output

  • RSSHub: Everything is RSSible

  • osmosfeed: Turn GitHub into an RSS reader

  • Dashword: A simple tool to structure thoughts, plan projects, and create concepts

  • magic-wormhole/croc: Get things from one computer to another, safely
